titles: Alimony arraign'd, or The remonstrance and humble appeal of Thomas Ivie Esq; from the high court of chancery, to His Highnes the Lord Protector of the Commonwealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland, &c. VVherein are set forth the unheard-of practices and villanies of lewd and defamed vvomen, in order to separate man and wife.
Humble appeal and remonstrance of Thomas Ivie, Esq.
author: Ivie, Thomas.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Divorce --  Law and legislation --  England --  Early works to 1800.
